caption.p: A sample of a haloculture complex. This is a haloculture research pilot that has been established in Jofair region, Khuzestan Province, in the southwest of Iran, in a joint program between the “National Salinity Research Center, Agricultural Research, Education and Extension Organization” and “Biotechnology Development Council, Vice-Presidency for Science and Technology”. This 50- hectare research pilot has 40 ha of cultivated area including 5 ha of fishery, 20 ha of arboriculture and 15 ha of farmed crops.
